item.title: Become A Learning Machine 2.0: Read 300 Books This Year Review
item.description: If you are trying to improve your reading speed, you have come to the right place. I will explain a few things about speed reading and comprehension, then I will give you a few useful tips and review a marvelous course which I recommend since it will help you become one of the fastest readers in the world. How to read a book fast and understand it ? You should know that everyone has a natural reading speed, which translate to how many words you can read per minute, this is normal and has some variations, the more you read, the faster and easier it will become for you since your brain would store all the words and possible combinations of words.

item.title: Become A Learning Machine: How To Read 300 Books This Year Review
